org.nasdanika.html.model.bootstrap

Interface Border

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EObject, Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BorderImpl

    public interface Border
extends EObject
    A representation of the model object 'Border'. Border configuration specifies border location and color.

    The following features are supported:

    • Color
    • Top
    • Bottom
    • Left
    • Right
    See Also:
    BootstrapPackage.getBorder()
